What would be the most efficient and effective pedagogical approach to teach an 11-year-old student the principles of multiplication? How can we ensure that the strategy covers all aspects of the subject, including times tables, multiplication as repeated addition, associative and distributive properties, and practical applications in problem-solving scenarios? Moreover, how can we incorporate the individual learning style of the student and use visual aids, interactive exercises, and formative feedback mechanisms to reinforce learning and track progress over time?
Can you provide a PHP code that would help create interactive exercises and track student progress in learning multiplication?
